Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities

Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, Ally, AxeOfGodrick, Barrack, Bug, Cage, CapabilitySet, Cliff, Club, ConsumableItem, Crater, Dirt, Dog, Enemy, FingerReaderEnia, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, Floor, Floor, Floor, GiantCrab, GiantCrayFish, GiantDog, GodrickSoldier, GoldenFogDoor, GoldenRunes, GraftedDragon, Graveyard, GreatKnife, Grossmesser, Ground, GustOfWind, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, Invader, Item, LockedDoor, LoneWolf, MartianItem, MerchantKale, Player, Player, Player, PuddleOfWater, RemembranceOfTheGrafted, Rune, Scimitar, SiteOfLostGrace, SkeletalBandit, Stick, SummonSign, Tree, Uchigatana, Wall, Wall, WeaponItem
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
    Attach capability/status to the instance
    java.util.List<java.lang.Enum<?>> capabilitiesList()  
    boolean hasCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
    Check if this instance has capability
    void removeCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
    Detach capability/status from the instance
